name: d3-hexbin
description: Group two-dimensional points into hexagonal bins.

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf dist && yarn test && rollup -c && mkdir -p test/output && test/compare-images
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j dist/${npm_package_name}.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/${npm_package_name}.js dist/${npm_package_name}.min.js
